creatures.name: Thunder Wolf
creatures.description: A swift predator that runs with lightning speed through mountain trails.
creatures.lore: Thunder Wolves are known to inhabit high-altitude regions where storms are frequent.

creatures.name: Flame Phoenix
creatures.description: A majestic bird of fire that rises from intense training sessions.
creatures.lore: Only the most dedicated athletes can summon this legendary creature.

creatures.name: Aqua Serpent
creatures.description: A graceful water creature that emerges during swimming sessions.
creatures.lore: Found in all major bodies of water, this creature loves to accompany swimmers.

creatures.name: Golden Dragon
creatures.description: The ultimate prize for elite athletes who push beyond their limits.
creatures.lore: Legends speak of this dragon appearing only to those who achieve greatness.

creatures.name: Forest Spirit
creatures.description: A gentle creature that appears during peaceful nature walks.
creatures.lore: These spirits guide hikers through ancient forests and mountain paths.

creatures.name: Iron Titan
creatures.description: A powerful being forged in the fires of intense strength training.
creatures.lore: Born from determination and perseverance in the weight room.

creatures.name: Wind Falcon
creatures.description: A swift bird that soars alongside cyclists on their journeys.
creatures.lore: Known to race with cyclists, testing their speed and endurance.

creatures.name: Crystal Guardian
creatures.description: A mystical protector that appears after sustained cardiovascular excellence.
creatures.lore: Guards the realm between mortal endurance and superhuman achievement.

creatures.name: Shadow Panther
creatures.description: A stealthy predator that appears during night runs.
creatures.lore: Moves silently through the darkness, only visible to those who dare run at night.

creatures.name: Boulder Bear
creatures.description: A sturdy companion for those who enjoy mountain hiking.
creatures.lore: These gentle giants roam mountain trails and protect hikers from harm.

creatures.name: Solar Lion
creatures.description: A radiant beast whose mane burns with the energy of sunrise
creatures.lore: Said to draw strength from the rising sun, this radiant beast rewards those who train with daily discipline.

creatures.name: Frost Wyrm
creatures.description: A serpentine dragon born of icy breath
creatures.lore: This ice-born serpent appears to those who brave the cold and chase the frost.

creatures.name: Ember Fox
creatures.description: A fiery creature that sparks motivation during short, intense bursts of activity.
creatures.lore: A quick and fiery creature that appears when passion burns bright during short workouts.

creatures.name: Storm Rhino
creatures.description: A thunderous powerhouse that charges forward with unstoppable momentum
creatures.lore: A thunderous powerhouse, this beast charges beside riders who push their limits.

creatures.name: Fat Snail
creatures.description: A fat snail for fat people. Impressive bulk, but very slow
creatures.lore: Slow but tanky.

creatures.name: Nooel's Krocodile
creatures.description: A one of a kind crocodile, obtainable through a secret achievement
creatures.lore: Kee-Ith's long lost childhood pet, adopted by Nooel.

creatures.name: Black Gorilla
creatures.description: Black Gorilla
creatures.lore: What a funny monkey.

creatures.name: Worm
creatures.description: Worm
creatures.lore: It's just a worm.

creatures.name: Blue Eyes White Gorilla
creatures.description: A rare variant of the black gorilla
creatures.lore: A black gorilla that turned white, better than the black gorilla.

creatures.name: Bumblebee's Baggie
creatures.description: Baggie Bumblebee
creatures.lore: What's in bumblebee's baggie? Just pollen, or..?

creatures.name: Electric Mouse
creatures.description: A legally distinct, cute, little electric rodent.
creatures.lore: An adorable yellow mouse able to control electricity. It looks kind of familiar...

creatures.name: UWU Bird
creatures.description: uwu bird
creatures.lore: The true koels, Eudynamys, are a genus of cuckoos from Asia, Australia and the Pacific. They are large sexually dimorphic cuckoos that eat fruits and insects and have loud distinctive calls. They are brood parasites, laying their eggs in the nests of other species.

creatures.name: Ouroboros
creatures.description: A mythical and ancient snake that eats its own tail.
creatures.lore: An ancient myth speaks of a snake eating its own tail, representing the eternal cycle of life, death, and rebirth, as well as infinity and the unity of the beginning and the end.

creatures.name: Fish with Legs
creatures.description: A curious fish with legs that likes to run.
creatures.lore: This fish somehow grew legs. It doesn't seem to mind, however, and just keeps running anyways.

creatures.name: Frostbite Lynx
creatures.description: A cold-furred hunter moving silently on frozen lakes.
creatures.lore: Its breath crystallizes the air

creatures.name: Thunderhoof
creatures.description: A boar that charges with thunderous force.
creatures.lore: Lightning dances beneath its hooves.

creatures.name: Mossback Torto
creatures.description: A slow but relentless wanderer covered in moss.
creatures.lore: It carries centuries of wisdom.

creatures.name: Obsidian Ravager
creatures.description: A panther forged from volcanic glass.
creatures.lore: Its claws leave molten trails.

creatures.name: Radiant Griffin
creatures.description: A fusion of strength and grace
creatures.lore: A noble creature of balance, soaring alongside those who blend power with grace.

creatures.name: Twilight raven
creatures.description: A mysterious messenger of renewal
creatures.lore: A mysterious bird that heralds renewal, seen by runners who find peace in the dark.

creatures.name: Swole Turtle
creatures.description: A slow but absurdly strong reptile with the patience of a saint.
creatures.lore: This calm companion reminds individuals that progress always beats pace.

creatures.name: Quadzilla
creatures.description: A towering lizard known for legs so mighty they shake the earth.
creatures.lore: Legend has it that it has quads the size of mountains

creatures.name: Captain Cardio
creatures.description: A relentless motivator who believes the mind is the best weapon.
creatures.lore: Legend says this hero once outran a treadmill for insubordination.

creatures.name: Battle Badger
creatures.description: A furious little fighter with unlimited rage and zero chill.
creatures.lore: Donâ€™t let its size fool you â€” itâ€™s been banned from three boot camps for excessive aggression.

creatures.name: Corporal Crunch
creatures.description: A shredded man that leads core drills with terrifying enthusiasm.
creatures.lore: Rumor says it once punched a protein shake into existence mid-sit-up.

creatures.name: Storm Lynx
creatures.description: A lightning-charged feline that moves in flashes.
creatures.lore: Legends say it races thunder itself.

creatures.name: Lava Moth
creatures.description: A moth with wings dripping molten fire.
creatures.lore: It survives by drinking magma.

creatures.name: Pebble Yak
creatures.description: A small yak with stone-like fur.
creatures.lore: Fur as hard as rock like its mental fortitude

creatures.name: Emberpaw
creatures.description: A feline of pure flame sprinting across volcanic plains.
creatures.lore: Born from smoldering molten golem embers casted by immortal wizards.

creatures.name: Sain Ubolt
creatures.description: A lightning-forged sprinter whose footsteps split the air. The embodiment of ultimate speed and relentless discipline
creatures.lore: Born from the spark of a legend, Sain Ubolt moves so fast he outruns his own shadow.

creatures.name: Magical Monkey
creatures.lore: This magical monkey is only visible to people who touch grass regularly.

creatures.name: Commando Crab
creatures.description: Better check your bearings
creatures.lore: Only for the best, this commando crab is only for those with commando gold.

creatures.name: Fat Frog
creatures.description: This frog once ate 55 burgers, 55 fries, 55 tater tots and 55 milkshakes
creatures.lore: This fat frog can fit 500 cheeeseburgers in it

creatures.name: C4 Cat
creatures.description: Exploding kitten, but it grew up.
creatures.lore: Nobody knows when this cat is going to expl....ðŸ§¨

creatures.name: Twin Tapirs
creatures.description: A pair of powerful tapirs.
creatures.lore: This pair of tapirs are always seen together, how cute

creatures.name: Clumsy Cheetah
creatures.description: One of the fastest creatures, but is hindered by its uncoordinated movements.
creatures.lore: This cheetah ran into a wall, making it clumsy

creatures.name: Special snake
creatures.description: A special snake with special behaviour.
creatures.lore: This snake was born special, he looks down but is always positive about things.

creatures.name: Resilient Guardian
creatures.description: Got thrown in a forest for 3 days, didnt sleep for 4 days.
creatures.lore: This guardian has survived in the jungle for a long time.

creatures.name: Matador Mole
creatures.description: A mole with a rocket launcher.
creatures.lore: Nobody knows where this mole got his matador from, but nobody dares come close.

creatures.name: Polar Bear
creatures.description: A normal bear wearing a polar watch.
creatures.lore: You thought it was a polar bear but no, its a normal bear with a polar watch

creatures.name: 67 Ants
creatures.description: A handful of ants.
creatures.lore: These 7 ants always stay together as a group, although one always goes missing...

creatures.name: Lava Lizard
creatures.description: A lizard with lava skin.
creatures.lore: Born in molten heat, this lizard thrives when the body pushes through burning fatigue.

creatures.name: Turbo Toad
creatures.description: A toad so fast it leaves dust clouds behind with every hop.
creatures.lore: A toad faster than most humans. Its leaps defy common sense.

creatures.name: Mecha Penguin
creatures.description: A cybernetic swimmer designed for extreme endurance in icy waters.
creatures.lore: Engineered for icy endurance, this robotic penguin outswims submarines.

creatures.name: Iron Koala
creatures.description: A slow-moving powerhouse known for its quiet, unbreakable strength.
creatures.lore: Moves slow, lifts heavy. Never skips eucalyptus day.

creatures.name: Starlight Hare
creatures.description: A luminous runner that races through moonlit trails at incredible speed.
creatures.lore: Said to leave glowing trails as it runs beneath moonlight.

creatures.name: Caffeine Crow
creatures.description: A hyperactive bird that trains before sunrise and never rests.
creatures.lore: Fueled by caffeine and chaos, this crow wakes earlier than you.

creatures.name: Boulder Crab
creatures.description: A heavy-lifting crustacean that treats boulders like dumbbells.
creatures.lore: Known to lift boulders larger than itself. It never skips leg day.

creatures.name: Sonic Seahorse
creatures.description: A tiny sea creature that dashes through waves at lightning speed.
creatures.lore: Small, but quick as a current. Loves racing dolphins.

creatures.name: Sleepy Sloth
creatures.description: A calm reminder that proper rest builds lasting strength.
creatures.lore: A reward for recovery. Even legends need sleep.

creatures.name: Volt Viper
creatures.description: A sleek serpent charged with energy, striking faster than thought.
creatures.lore: A serpent charged with pure energy, striking faster than thought.

creatures.name: Sushi Cat
creatures.description: A cheerful cat that rolls into workouts with endless energy.
creatures.lore: Known to roll into class uninvited. Always meows for protein snacks.

creatures.name: Magma Rhino
creatures.description: A molten beast whose charge melts roads and limits alike.
creatures.lore: Its hooves ignite the ground with every pedal stroke.

creatures.name: Paper Crane
creatures.description: A fragile bird that follows hikers seeking peace and balance.
creatures.lore: A fragile symbol of peace that follows quiet hikers.

creatures.name: Protein Duck
creatures.description: A muscular duck obsessed with post-workout gains and meal timing.
creatures.lore: Quacks every time you finish a rep. Always bulking.

creatures.name: Phantom Fox
creatures.description: A spectral hunter seen only by those who train with perfect consistency.
creatures.lore: Said to appear only to those with unbroken discipline. Disappears at dawn.

creatures.name: Thundersnail
creatures.description: The fastest snail you'll ever lay your eyes upon.
creatures.lore: Said to be 10x the speed of the average snail.

creatures.name: Leaf Kitty
creatures.description: A cute little kitty made of foliage.
creatures.lore: When it purrs, it releases a nice floral aroma, calming anyone who smells it.

creatures.name: Black Cat
creatures.description: A mischievious black cat. Brings about misfortune to those near to it.
creatures.lore: Those that come near it are said to suffer from bad luck. At least it's cute.

creatures.name: Rolla-dillo
creatures.description: A rock-hard armadillo that rolls wherever it goes.
creatures.lore: With its rock-hard scales, it builds up incredible speeds by tucking into a ball and rolling, before smashing into its target.

creatures.name: Glass Canary
creatures.description: Fragile, but sharp and deadly.
creatures.lore: A fragile, graceful bird that graces its opponents with 10000 cuts.

creatures.name: Goldfish
creatures.description: A fish that'll make you rich.
creatures.lore: A fish made of pure, solid gold. While not the best for battle, it grants its owner riches far beyond imagination.

creatures.name: Coastline Glider
creatures.description: A breezy spirit that glides along East Coastâ€™s paths, nudging you to keep pace.
creatures.lore: Rumour says it formed from salty sea breezes and old skateboard stickers.

creatures.name: Kopi Gorilla
creatures.description: Powered by kopi-gao, this gorilla fuels morning lifts and never skips chest day.
creatures.lore: Locals swear it used to work night shifts at a kopi stall before becoming a gym legend.

creatures.name: Hawker Aunty
creatures.description: Calls you 'shuai ge' or 'mei mei' no matter how sweaty you look, motivates you with loud tough-love.
creatures.lore: Appears across estates randomly, teleporting between kopitiams to shout encouragement.

creatures.name: Monsoon Lynx
creatures.description: A sleek rain-cat that appears when thunderclouds roll in, pushing you to run through puddles.
creatures.lore: Joggers tell tales of a cat that guides them home through sudden downpours.

creatures.name: Milo Dinosaur
creatures.description: A cocoa-dusted dinosaur born from overflowed Milo cups â€” a chugger of comfort and stamina.
creatures.lore: Swim coaches joke Miloâ€™s energy comes from powdered courage.

creatures.name: Tiong Bahru Tiger
creatures.description: Old-school morning runner: lean, disciplined, and spotted around heritage lanes.
creatures.lore: Bread-shop aunties whisper about the tigerâ€™s steady sunrise route.

creatures.name: Durian Pangolin
creatures.description: A spiky pangolin with durian-thorn armour â€” defensive and surprisingly strong.
creatures.lore: Only appears during durian season, smells like controversy and sweetness.

creatures.name: Orchard Crane
creatures.description: A graceful city spirit born from neon lights and festival energy.
creatures.lore: Festival lights coalesced into a bird that loves vertical movement.

creatures.name: Chilli Stingray
creatures.description: A spicy stingray that breathes steam and pushes you to hit hot training targets.
creatures.lore: Fierce on the outside but fond of friendly sparring.

creatures.name: Kallang Rooster
creatures.description: A stadium-born rooster whose crow pumps adrenaline into local athletes.
creatures.lore: Descended from the Kallang Roar that once shook stadiums.

creatures.name: HDB Neko
creatures.description: Void-deck cat spirit known for calm stretches and tiny daily routines.
creatures.lore: Residents leave milk and luck in exchange for calm corridors.

creatures.name: Rainforest Hornbill
creatures.description: A lungy hornbill built for long effort â€” thrives on sustained outdoor exertion.
creatures.lore: Its call is said to guide lost hikers back to the trailhead.

creatures.name: Changi Glider
creatures.description: A coastal glider that rides trade winds â€” great company for long rides.
creatures.lore: Keeps night riders safe from bad navigation.

creatures.name: Marina Sentinel
creatures.description: A stone-and-water harbour guardian that tests consistency.
creatures.lore: Awakens only for those who train like tides: constant and relentless.

creatures.name: Morayna Barrage
creatures.description: A wind-riding eel born from kite-flying gusts.
creatures.lore: Born from the winds across the Barrage when kites fill the sky.

creatures.name: Ice Kachang Beetle
creatures.description: A beetle with syrup-coloured shell patterns that boost small exercises.
creatures.lore: Forms where ice melts fastest â€” under kopitiam umbrellas.

creatures.name: Esplanade Echo Bat
creatures.description: A sound-reactive bat that thrives on rhythm and interval pacing.
creatures.lore: Born from rehearsal rooms deep under the Esplanade.

creatures.name: Hydroxia
creatures.description: An octopus capable of launching high pressured water projectiles. Asphyxiation and water certainly don't blend well together.
creatures.lore: Perplexed by how slow everything is, Hydroxia just wants people to swim fast like it.

creatures.name: Fenrir Knight
creatures.description: A glorious defender with valiancy and honour. He loves to defend with all of his might.
creatures.lore: Though he did not manage to win her heart, he managed to conquered his heartbreak and conquered the mountains

creatures.name: DIStroyer
creatures.description: An ultimate destructive weapon of the DIS. Use with CAUTION!
creatures.lore: DEEEE EYEEE ASSSSS! OW OWWWW! LEADS THE WAY AH!

creatures.name: Low Riders
creatures.description: A bunch of gnomes who have strong willpower.
creatures.lore: Once in a happy living village, these scoundrels decided to leave and live by themselves. Regretful decision? You can say so.

creatures.name: Chromatic Alex
creatures.description: A quick, decisive, and agile fighter, with his chromatic sword of excalibur.
creatures.lore: Speedoooo. He's fast, he's chromatic, he's charismatic! He just wants to be fast!

creatures.name: Night Prowler
creatures.description: A stealthy wolf that leaps and lashes on its enemy with deadly force.
creatures.lore: Prowl and howl! The wolf lurks and moves fast and swift and unleashes a heavy force, though it gets tired after one leap. especially during the day :p

creatures.name: Luxia
creatures.description: A wonderous mythological beauty that outshines the battlefield.
creatures.lore: Her love to levitate around the skies and bask in the sun's horizon tints her complexity, making her outshine her opponents

creatures.name: Electroman
creatures.description: Obsessed with electricity and boom boom.
creatures.lore: Loves striking its foes with electrifying fear. (though it's not very scary...)

creatures.name: Saitamars
creatures.description: Deals devastation with just one punch.
creatures.lore: 100 push ups, sit ups, and squats. But at what cost of his humanity?

creatures.name: Miracle Sprout
creatures.description: A little plant that loves to boost the morale of the team.
creatures.lore: It just loves to heal and boost the team's morale, being the guardian of the backlines

creatures.name: Bastion
creatures.description: A creature that controls a robot to conquer any adversary imminent
creatures.lore: On the outside he's tough, on the insided he's soft. Such bipolar opposites...

creatures.name: Earth Bender
creatures.description: A monkey that uses his stick to erupt havock and smash rocks
creatures.lore: Thought the monkeys would only swing across trees? This one's pretty sigma and destroys them instead!

creatures.name: Thornscale Ravager
creatures.description: A swift, armored predator with immense strength, blistering speed, and relentless endurance.
creatures.lore: Born from ancient forest spirits, it hunts intruders to preserve forgotten wilderness.

creatures.name: Frostgloom Strider
creatures.description: A silent, ice-veiled hunter with sharp power, quick movement, and decent stamina.
creatures.lore: Born in eternal blizzards, it wanders frozen realms seeking forgotten truths.

creatures.name: Ironbark Devourer
creatures.description: A lumbering creature with sturdy strength, slow but steady speed, and great resilience.
creatures.lore: Formed from ancient roots, it protects forest borders from careless wanderers.

creatures.name: Stormlash Gryphon
creatures.description: A winged warrior channeling fierce lightning, unmatched aerial speed, and long-lasting vigor.
creatures.lore: Born from thunderclouds, it serves as guardian to ancient sky temples.

creatures.name: Mirefang Creeper
creatures.description: A swamp-dwelling crawler with modest strength, slow speed, and stubborn endurance.
creatures.lore: Legends say it evolved from cursed marsh spirits seeking solid ground.

creatures.name: Celestine Veilwyrm
creatures.description: A radiant serpent wielding cosmic power, near-instant speed, and endless endurance.
creatures.lore: Formed from stardust, it drifts between realms guiding chosen travelers.

creatures.name: Rambletooth Grazer
creatures.description: A gentle herbivore with mild strength, steady pace, and dependable endurance.
creatures.lore: Ancient farmers bred it to maintain overgrown fields and peaceful valleys.

creatures.name: Rusthide Burrower
creatures.description: A small tunneler with surprising toughness, moderate speed, and sturdy persistence.
creatures.lore: Said to shape underground paths used by travelers avoiding surface dangers.

creatures.name: Shadowmane Skulker
creatures.description: A swift night-stalking beast with sharp power and impressive stamina reserves.
creatures.lore: Rumored to watch over moonlit forests, judging intruders silently from darkness.

creatures.name: Stormroot Charger
creatures.description: A bulky creature empowered by earth energy, charging quickly with immense durability.
creatures.lore: Born where lightning strikes ancient trees, it absorbs natureâ€™s fury effortlessly.

creatures.name: Ironwing Stryker
creatures.description: A metal-feathered raptor boasting strong power, razor speed, and fierce endurance.
creatures.lore: Forged by forgotten smith-gods, it patrols high cliffs for worthy challengers.

creatures.name: Twilight Riftcaller
creatures.description: A mystical predator bending shadows, moving blindingly fast with tireless resilience.
creatures.lore: Emerges through dimensional tears to hunt anomalies disturbing cosmic balance.

creatures.name: Ling Gang Guli
creatures.description: A fabulous pig-knight with sparkly armor, mediocre power, and dramatic flair.
creatures.lore: Born when a potato sneezed, it wanders chanting incomprehensible wobble noises.

creatures.name: Bingbong Skibbidler
creatures.description: Spins violently, screams "BINGBONG", and then immediately forgets what itâ€™s doing.
creatures.lore: Sages say its brain rattles like marbles in a metal bowl.

creatures.name: Tung Tung Beast
creatures.description: Runs in circles yelling "TUNG TUNG BRRRT", fueled by cosmic stupidity.
creatures.lore: Summoned accidentally during a midnight snack ritual gone horribly silly.

creatures.name: Sahur Snoingler
creatures.description: Makes bizarre "SAHUR SAHUR" noises while hopping sideways like malfunctioning furniture.
creatures.lore: Said to appear at dawn screaming nonsense to wake lazy villagers.

creatures.name: Zurzleblorp Giggletoad
creatures.description: A vibrating amphibian blurping uncontrollably, spreading chaotic giggles everywhere.
creatures.lore: Spawned when a frog licked a lightning crystal during a dare.

creatures.name: Fweebloink the Unhinged
creatures.description: A wobbling goofy blob going "glooba glooba" while tripping over itself.
creatures.lore: Historians claim it once fought a tree for looking suspicious.
